title: Just got my second account banned for toxicity, wtf riot
body:
My first account got banned because is used the word %%%got, and it wasn't even directed at anyone. my second got banned because i was complaining about the new champ {{champion:142}}. I think we can all agree she is cancer, didn't even insult anyone and now my account is perma banned. Over the past few months i have received numerous account suspensions and chat bans, most of them were deserved, but it just seems like i can't use chat without getting a suspension, most of the time i'm not insulting or flaming anyone, i'm just using derogatory words, its just how i normally talk, and i haven't had any problems talking to people in the real world.

apparently i'm in the 0.006% of people who get banned, but i find that hard to believe seeing as the boundaries for getting banned are so easily crossed, riot needs to find a better solution, i don't understand why they just perma ban your account when the problem is toxicity, why don't they just chat restrict your account indefinitely. doesn't make any sense. 

I feel so robbed, luckily i haven't spent money on this game, but i have spent about 2 years on it, just for them to take it away because of the way i talk. smh riot.

also i want to apologize to the person who did my support ticket when i couldent log into my account, if for some reason they come across this post. when i asked if they could unban my account, they said toxicity bans are permanent, and I said "my bad i didn't realize this is fucking North Korea". not mad at you, just the fact i got banned, sorry.

replies.body:
> My first account got banned because is used the word %%%got

That'll do it.

> second got banned because i was complaining about the new champ Zoe

I call shenanigans.

typing %%%got shouldn't get you banned. this is the chat log from the game my account got perma banned

JewcusMkhebrew: wtf is that
JewcusMkhebrew: why riot
JewcusMkhebrew: baited smh
JewcusMkhebrew: zoe is fun to play agasint
JewcusMkhebrew: what a fair and balanced fucking sutn
JewcusMkhebrew: the 2 second delay doesnt make it balanced
JewcusMkhebrew: its just a timer so you have time to slit your wrists
JewcusMkhebrew: then says fuck u no movement for 20 years
JewcusMkhebrew: then lose 90% of my hp to one ability
JewcusMkhebrew: this champ is worse than cancer
JewcusMkhebrew: wtf riot
JewcusMkhebrew: pls
JewcusMkhebrew: thanks riot for making new champs balanced
JewcusMkhebrew: there it is
JewcusMkhebrew: somehow get a gunblade
JewcusMkhebrew: i dont have her
JewcusMkhebrew: yes u did

Are you sure these are your chat logs ...

here we go ...

[2:45] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): wtf is that
[2:47] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): why riot
[3:39] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): baited smh
[6:31] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): zoe is fun to play agasint

[9:45] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): then says fuck u no movement for 20 years
[10:55] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): wtf riot

[15:28] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): there it is

[15:35] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): fuck u
[19:11] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): i dont have her
[19:14] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): and im not a %%%got
[23:08] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): can we get a 9x for this zoe
[23:22] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): making the game toxic
[23:33] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): playing zoe
[23:59] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): varus
[24:03] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): can u report this zoe
[24:13] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): yes u did
[25:21] [All] JewcusMkhebrew (Jax): fucking kys

Plz stop with the edits people, it's hurting my heart.
I didn't know there was more, the shit i posted is just what my friend sent me.

Wait, your friend sent you the chat logs for your account?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-29T21:32:34.559+0000)
>
> typing %%%got shouldn't get you banned. this is the chat log from the game my account got perma banned
It's not my account its my friends.
Are you playing on your friends account then? Because this post is literally titled "Just got my second account banned for toxicity, wtf riot"

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=000000000001000200000000,timestamp=2017-12-01T22:17:02.968+0000)
>
> It's not my account its my friends.

Yeah sure it is:

- my second got banned because i was complaining about the new champ

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-29T21:27:14.282+0000)
>
> I wasn't flaming, just using words like %%%got, cancer, jew, and shit like that, nothing malicious. and the second point, i don't int, ive never int'd before, however if they permanently restricted **my account**, for chat, and then i started tinting, then ban me, not just straight up ban me.

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-29T21:32:34.559+0000)
>
> typing %%%got shouldn't get you banned. this is the chat log from the game **my account** got perma banned

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2017-11-30T21:33:46.314+0000)
>
> All i'm saying is **my account** shouldn't get perma banned for chat, 


Please get your lying ass out & never come back.

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=000000000001000200000000,timestamp=2017-12-01T22:17:02.968+0000)
>
> It's not my account its my friends.

You got your friend's account banned, congrats.
I am laughing so hard
{{summoner:11}}
with {{item:1412}}
There's my man Riot Tantram with the {{summoner:11}}

> ewcusMkhebrew: its just a timer so you have time to slit your wrists

That may be the red flag, other than your flavorful summoner name.
Its not toxic towards anyone tho. nothing i said was toxic towards anyone. just venting at the game cuz i think that champ is bullshit.

Oh I know, but the system may have caught the trigger phrase. You may consider asking Riot Support if that was the reason you were banned to see if you can get an appeal. There's nothing else in the logs that really looks toxic, if that's ALL of your chat logs.
I already started a support ticket, apparently riot's bot doesn't make mistakes. i think they're salty i'm roasting them tbh
You used hate speech, doesn't look like it made a mistake.

>i'm just using derogatory words, its just how i normally talk...

Riot has made it clear that derogatory language isn't allowed. You might normally talk like that, but Riot's servers aren't the place to do that, just like even if you normally shout at your friends a movie theater isn't an appropriate place for that behavior.

>  but it just seems like i can't use chat without getting a suspension,

Then, why keep using the chat? If you can't avoid getting banned for flaming, just stop flaming.

>  i don't understand why they just perma ban your account when the problem is toxicity, why don't they just chat restrict your account indefinitely. doesn't make any sense.

It makes a ton of sense actually. Riot used to give out infinitely scaling chat restrictions. Do you know what happened? People started inting instead.

I wasn't flaming, just using words like %%%got, cancer, jew, and shit like that, nothing malicious. and the second point, i don't int, ive never int'd before, however if they permanently restricted my account, for chat, and then i started tinting, then ban me, not just straight up ban me.
I'm hard to personally offend, but the way you've described your actions makes me feel disgusted that you're invoking my people in any context.
you clearly cant be hard to offend if you feel disgusted i used the word jew. also my family is jewish so its not ur people, its our people.

The fact that you included "jew" in your list of words you think you got in trouble for, without provocation, makes me quite certain you used the word in a negative context. 

You've demonstrated an attitude, at least in-game, that greatly disturbs me. I don't particularly care what your family backstory is. Figure out a healthier way to express yourself if you choose to attempt a third account, but don't go around blaming others for your transgressions.

an example of when i would use it would be. if i chased a kill i shouldnt have, then died, i would say that was pretty jewish of me. its also the healthiest way i can use it because it untilts me. also stop lying to yourself you get offended super easy. also i never blamed anyone else, i just said the rules were stupid, and should be changed.

Saying the rules are stupid and should be changed after your equivalent EIGHTH infraction is blaming somebody else. 

The rules are fine, you're just a toxic person and wish you weren't punished for acting that way. 

Your use of "jewish" is shitty if you aren't one and shameful if you are.

Saying the rules are stupid is blaming someone else, if it is unjustified, in my case it is justified. if riot were to just chat restrict my account there would be no way for me to be toxic, and the problem would be solved, they don't need to take it to this extreme. also you don't know me, i'm a very polite person, although i may not use appropriate language i am a nice person. judging someones character on one words is just as disgusting as saying the word itself so kindly fuck off. i'm not whining that my account is banned, i'm simply trying to bring this issue to peoples attention so something can be done about it.

It's hard for me to rationalize a "polite person" getting banned from the same game twice. Maybe you're polite to people who you see in person, but don't bother being polite when you're anonymous online?
Nothing i said was malicious, i just used it in normal texts, mostly for jokes, or if im venting about things i find bullshit about the game, but nothing towards other players for the most part.

Look, I'll make it simple for you.

There are straightforward rules of conduct. You've broken them MANY times. That's why you're banned.

Dislike the rules? Don't agree with them? Keep on arguing your point if you must, but know that you argue from a position of weakness. Nobody is going to assume selfless goals of somebody who has managed to get banned twice.

> I wasn't flaming, just using words like %%%got, cancer, jew, and shit like that, nothing malicious.

Ooohh, you didn't flame! you were only highly offensive! Well, too bad it's also against the rules to use those words. Nothing malicious, just policy.

>  and the second point, i don't int, ive never int'd before, however if they permanently restricted my account, for chat, and then i started tinting, then ban me, not just straight up ban me.

So Riot should make an exception for you personally, just by your promise that you wont int, even though statistically you are likely going to if they do?

There is a reason the system is as it is now, and not how you describe. And that's because it has experimentally ben proven to be a bad system.

All i'm saying is my account shouldn't get perma banned for chat, when its a very reasonable solution for them to just restrict my chat. I shouldn't be perma banned on the basis i might do something, that i have never had a history of doing, just because statistically there is a good chance i will do it. that's like arresting people for murder, because they robbed someone, because they might kill someone in the future, that's just not how the world works, so why is that how league works. the test they did wasn't even close to accurate. they conducted it on the PBE, which is known for toxicity, mostly due to the fact nobody gives a fuck if their account gets banned, as its not connected with their actual account, and they don't have to work to unlock champs, or spend money. the reason it failed was because players saw it as an opportunity to be extremely toxic without the threat of a perma ban, only a chat restriction, on an account they could care less about, and put not time or effort into.

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2017-11-30T21:33:46.314+0000)
>
> All i'm saying is my account shouldn't get perma banned for chat, when its a very reasonable solution for them to just restrict my chat. I shouldn't be perma banned on the basis i might do something, that i have never had a history of doing, just because statistically there is a good chance i will do it. that's like arresting people for murder, because they robbed someone, because they might kill someone in the future, that's just not how the world works, so why is that how league works. the test they did wasn't even close to accurate. they conducted it on the PBE, which is known for toxicity, mostly due to the fact nobody gives a fuck if their account gets banned, as its not connected with their actual account, and they don't have to work to unlock champs, or spend money. the reason it failed was because players saw it as an opportunity to be extremely toxic without the threat of a perma ban, only a chat restriction, on an account they could care less about, and put not time or effort into.

[Riot Tantram posted about this 2 months ago:](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/wsObUaFj-if-tyler1?comment=00010001000000000000) 

> It really breaks down into two categories.
> 
> 1.) Helping players reform
> 2.) Shielding others from the behavior, at a cost.
> 
> We used to issue chat restrictions that essentially scaled indefinitely. 
> 
> We were able to determine that after a certain point the penalty no longer helped with reform. The 10-game and 25-game counts for chat restrictions are based on data that they were both light enough, and felt strict enough to encourage people to understand their behavior is unacceptable in game and change it.
> 
> We also saw that the players in this 'large restriction' category defaulted to gameplay altering means of harassing their team. It caused an increase in feeding and trolling.
> 
> The sample size of this population and time frame is huge. Essentially the time spanning from the introduction of chat restrictions to the introduction of IFS.
> 
> So my question for you is, would you rather have more feeders and less negative chat?
This didn't counter my point at all. you should read what i posted again, actually understand it, then respond.

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=000200000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-30T22:11:06.004+0000)
>
> This didn't counter my point at all. you should read what i posted again, actually understand it, then respond.

You don't seem to understand. The point isn't that you were insulting, it's that you were offensive.

That sort of language isn't welcome here.

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=00020000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-30T22:48:52.089+0000)
>
> < Removed by moderation >

This sort of response contributed to you getting banned.

After the equivalent of seven punishment tiers crossed by misusing chat, one would expect you to have learned how to communicate in a non-toxic manner by now. Even if Riot were a draconian entity with impossible rules to follow (they aren't), you'd still be at fault for not having figured it out with this many chances given.

if being yourself is calling people %%%%%%s & %%%gots then maybe you are the problem, and YOU are not welcome if thats how you behave, sorry life is not fair, and online games cater to the majority not the one dumb guy who can seem to get his shit together. Its not fair to the rest of the players if you being you is toxic, and hateful. I dont just get to murder people i hate becuase "thats jsut how i handle my anger" jeez this logic alludes me. Please either improve yourself so you're not having to use this language otherwise you are not going to be able to play this game, I surely understand what its like to what to say stuff, and be mean sometimes
im human and i have a really awful temper (PTSD from deployments) So i've def gone off the wire on people before but we need to be better than that, otherwise we arent welcome on league. so i had to learn how to deal with life, and how to be nice on a game full of people i want to smack in the face. but league is fun and i have fun

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-29T21:12:04.037+0000)
most of the time i&#039;m not insulting or flaming anyone, i&#039;m just using derogatory words, its just how i normally talk, and i haven&#039;t had any problems talking to people in the real world.


Regardless of this, not everyone has the same opinions as you do about your own toxicity.  Riot has set the standards here and you have repeatedly broken and violated those standards.
 
> apparently i&#039;m in the 0.006% of people who get banned, but i find that hard to believe seeing as the boundaries for getting banned are so easily crossed,

The problem isn't the boundaries.  The problem is that you keep crossing the boundaries.

 >riot needs to find a better solution, i don&#039;t understand why they just perma ban your account when the problem is toxicity, why don&#039;t they just chat restrict your account indefinitely. doesn&#039;t make any sense. 


They've practically already tried that.  Before this system we had a system where people would stack restrictions and the result was that some people stacked them indefinetely.

The problem is that these people resorted to passive aggression/inting and ruining the game experiences without chat
they only did it on the pbe tho. where people could give less of a fuck about their account. not really accurate.

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-12-01T02:42:24.685+0000)
>
> they only did it on the pbe tho. where people could give less of a fuck about their account. not really accurate.

I pretty sure it wasn't just the pbe and was a widespread system.

In fact, alot of the code for the IFS came from this previous system and it got its ability to give restrictions from the old system.

So in summary, we had this as an ongoing situation until Riot fixed it with our current IFS "escalation" system.

that {{summoner:11}} .

I can't understand why someone would lie about they're chat-logs if Riot is the one with the evidence xD
I have also never had a problem saying these things for 2 years, its only been the past 2 months for some reason.

> [{quoted}](name=ButtFungus5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XKApJIxh,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-11-29T21:35:00.257+0000)
>
> I have also never had a problem saying these things for 2 years, its only been the past 2 months for some reason.

Time to evaluate your situation of the past 2 months.
If you stopped being a decent summoner, chances are something changed on your end
Best of luck on your appeal or third account

I didn't mean ive become more toxic. i meant that i wasnt getting suspensions and chat restrictions. up until august i think i only had one chat restriction, and if anything i was more toxic back than, than i was in the past 2 months.
ButtFungus5 you just got your second account banned for toxicity, wtf ButtFungus5.
You deserved it.
